310280.name: RIFT - Glory of the Ascended Pack
310280.description:
RIFT, the award-winning fantasy MMORPG, is now completely free to play! Download today and enter the magical world of Telara: Experience an unprecedented class system, massive dynamic battles, and player housing like you’ve never seen before.

Experience RIFT in luxury! The Glory of the Ascended Pack contains a wide variety of mounts, costume items, and pets. You’ll be the envy of the other Ascended riding these stylish beasts and enjoying 90 days of Patron privileges!

Includes:
  • 4 Additional Character Slots per Server*
  • 2 Additional Bag Slots per Character*
  • Tartagon Mount
  • Spindrel Mount
  • Cyclone Mount
  • Tiger Mount
  • Ghost Hellbug Mount
  • Votan Fragger costume weapon
  • 24-Slot Bag
  • Bogling Wastrel Pet
  • Mini-Regulos Pet
  • Personal Banker
  • Portable Teleporter
  • Faction Tabard
  • 90-Day Patron Pass

*Additional Character and Bag Slots are only applied to accounts that have not purchased a boxed or digital copy of RIFT in the past. If you have already received these benefits for purchasing RIFT, these benefits will not stack.
310280.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
